Applicant : Prater, Madisson

Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : N/A

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As a first-year educator, I understand the importance of learning from the expertise of others. Hands on experience fosters the highest level of learning, and I aim to take that experience and knowledge back to my students, in ways big and small. A summer STEM program would offer myself the ability to deepen skills such as problem solving, creativity, and adaptability; all of which are skills I aim to push onto my students. 

STEM FIELDS THEY ARE PARTICULARLY INTERESTED IN LEARNING MORE ABOUT:

	* Life Science / Biology
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Math
